meanings.sent1: The rain is ruining my picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: Please don't ruin the surprise party by telling her!
meanings.sent3: His attempt to cook dinner ended up ruining the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The loud music is ruining my concentration like a storm in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The graffiti on the wall is slowly ruining the beauty of the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To cause harm or destruction to something
meanings.sent1: The storm is ruining the crops in the field.
meanings.sent2: The vandals are ruining the park benches.
meanings.sent3: His habit of forgetting to water the plants is ruining his chances of having a garden.
meanings.sent4: The virus is spreading quickly, ruining everything in its path like a wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The reckless driver is ruining the peaceful atmosphere of the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To make something unusable or ineffective
meanings.sent1: Spilling water on the laptop is ruining its functionality.
meanings.sent2: The lack of maintenance is ruining the machinery in the factory.
meanings.sent3: His constant interruptions are ruining the flow of the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The negative comments are ruining the positive vibe of the event.
meanings.sent5: The broken lock is ruining the security of the house.
